headline: SEREN RF MATCHING NETWORK CONTROLLER
categories.lvl1: Test & Measurement Equipment > Radio Frequency (RF) Equipment
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Radio Frequency (RF) Equipment > Other Radio Frequency Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Seren
Model MC2
Description Matching Network Controller
Other Information

Part number: 9200010001
Voltage: 98-125V or 198-250V
Frequency: 47-63 Hz, 100VA Maximum, 1.6A Maximum
Interfaces:
Matching Network: 15 pin Female D-Sub Connector
Serial RS-232: 9 pin Female D-Sub Connector
Analog Control: 25 Pin Female D-Sub Connector
Loop-Thru To Generator: 25 pin Female D-Sub Connector
Loop-Thru From System: 25 pin Male D-Sub Connector

Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.500 in (24.1 cm)
Depth 12.900 in (32.8 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 8 lb (4 kg)
